treatment.description: Cauline leaves: mid and distal crowded, greatly overlapping, lanceolate to ovate, 35–70 × 6–12 mm, little reduced distally. Involucres 6–8 mm. Phyllary faces sparsely to moderately (rarely densely) sericeous proximally and distally, eglandular. Ray florets 7–10; laminae 4.6–6.1 mm. Disc florets 15–20; corollas 3.2–4.5 mm, lobes 0.4–0.7 mm, glabrous. 2n = 18.
treatment.discussion: Narrower leaved plants of var. aequilifolia are similar to var. tenuifolia, with which it hybridizes.
